Actions.Name: Wind Slash
Actions.Description: The [name] deals 2 damage to all adjacent characters, then teleports 2, then gains stealth.

Combo.Name: Blightrazor
Combo.Effects: If only one character is caught in the area they are dazed and take bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Leaf Dance
Actions.Description: The [name] gains counter and evasion. After each time counter activates, it may teleport 1. This stance ends when the Mantid is hit by an attack.

Actions.Name: Cut Through
Actions.AreaEffect: 3 damage. The Mantid may teleport to any point on the line after this ability resolves.
